TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeDescriptorFilterService

summary.span: 提供介面，在設計模式中修改元件的成員描述項集。

span.span: Provides an interface to modify the set of member descriptors for a component in design mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面提供的介面，可讓您修改設計階段屬性、 事件和元件的類別層級屬性。The interface provides an interface that allows modification of the properties, events, and class-level attributes of a component at design time. 這項修改，就會發生透過元件透過所提供的描述元組。This modification occurs through the set of descriptors that a component provides through a . 型別描述項會查詢元件的站台服務和型別描述項若有的話，會傳遞到此服務已收集的所有中繼資料。The type descriptor will query a component's site for the service and, if it exists, the type descriptor will pass all metadata it has collected to this service. 然後服務就可以修改中繼資料，藉由新增、 移除及變更現有的元件的特性。The service can then modify the metadata by adding, removing, and altering existing characteristics of the component. 例如，修改元件的屬性，透過呼叫方法。For example, the properties of a component can be modified through a call to the method. 篩選服務取得字典，其中包含屬性名稱和其屬性的描述項類型。The filter service obtains a dictionary that contains property names and their property descriptors of type . 使用下列邏輯來實作所做的修改。The modifications are implemented using the following logic. |修改Modification|實作Implementation| |------------------|--------------------| |移除Removal|刪除在字典中的對應項目。Delete the corresponding entry in the dictionary.| |加入Addition|將適當的項目新增至字典中。Add the appropriate entry to the dictionary.| |改變Alteration|呼叫現有的屬性描述元方法、 將相關聯的屬性描述元項目，或取代整個屬性索引鍵/值組字典中。Call existing property descriptor methods, replace the associated property descriptor entry, or replace the entire property key/value pair in the dictionary.| 傳回值決定是否要修正這一組屬性。The return value of determines if this set of properties is fixed. 如果這個方法會傳回`true`，則針對此元件可以快取結果。If this method returns `true`, the for this component can cache the results. 此快取會維護，直到其中一個元件是回收或呼叫方法的類型描述元。This cache is maintained until either the component is garbage collected or the method of the type descriptor is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設計工具若要篩選的任何新的或現有的屬性集合新增新的設計工具，然後再載入或重新載入 按鈕的設計工具的設計工具的屬性。The following code example demonstrates a designer that uses the to filter the attributes collection of any new or existing to add a designer attribute for a new designer before loading or reloading the designer for the button. 若要使用的範例，將程式碼新增至 Windows Forms 專案，並從類別庫中載入 [工具箱] 中的元件。To use the example, add the code to a Windows Forms project and load the components from the class library into the Toolbox. 另請參閱[逐步解說： 自動填入 自訂元件工具箱](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx). 您可以加入一些按鈕到表單。Add some buttons to your form. 新增`ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`至表單，就會出現在元件匣中。Add a `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` to your form, and it will appear in the component tray. `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`會加入`ButtonDesignerFilterService`，它會實作，做為設計模式服務提供者。The `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` will add a `ButtonDesignerFilterService`, which implements , as a design mode service provider. 現有或新表單上的物件就會開始色彩循環之後`ButtonDesignerFilterService`會取代每個現有和新按鈕的設計工具`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`。Existing or new objects on the form will begin color cycling after the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` replaces the designer for each existing and new button with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`. 按鈕將循環，當您將滑鼠指標移它們，或者繼續循環或是上重設的背景和前景色彩的色彩`MouseLeave`事件。The buttons will color cycle when you move the mouse pointer over them, and alternately continue cycling or reset the background and foreground colors on `MouseLeave` events. 新物件會獲得`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`透過方法`ButtonDesignerFilterService`的已載入，直到`ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`處置並會取代原始。New objects will be given the `ColorCycleButtonDesigner` through the method of the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` that has been loaded, until the `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` is disposed and replaces the original . `ColorCycleButton`類別，在此範例中是聯`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`。The `ColorCycleButton` class in this example is a associated with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`. [!code-cpp[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要篩選所公開的成員描述元，在元件上實作這個介面，並覆寫， ，或分別篩選屬性、 事件或屬性，這個類別的方法。

span.span: To filter the member descriptors exposed by a , implement this interface on a component and override the , , or methods of this class to filter attributes, events, or properties, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterAttributes (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Collections.IDictionary attributes);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterAttributes(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed
Public Function FilterAttributes (component As IComponent, attributes As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterAttributes : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

span.span: The component to filter the attributes of.
A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.

summary.span: 篩選元件透過 所公開的屬性。

span.span: Filters the attributes that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果要對篩選的屬性集進行快取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者要求一組元件的屬性，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of attributes for a component. 屬性會加入至與該屬性的字典列為索引鍵，做為值的實際屬性。The attributes are added to the dictionary with the attribute's as the keys and the actual attribute as the value. 此服務的實作器可以新增、 移除或變更在字典中的現有屬性項目。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter existing attribute entries in the dictionary.

para.span: 傳回只有當有必要，因為重複的型別描述項的篩選器服務的查詢可能會降低效能。

span.span: Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterEvents (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Collections.IDictionary events);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterEvents(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Public Function FilterEvents (component As IComponent, events As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterEvents : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

param.name: component
param.span: 要為其篩選事件的元件。

span.span: The component to filter events for.
A dictionary of events that can be modified.

summary.span: 篩選元件透過 所公開的事件。

span.span: Filters the events that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果要對篩選的事件集進行快取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the set of filtered events is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者要求一組元件的事件，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of events for a component. 事件名稱的字典中加入事件做為索引鍵和對應做為值的物件。The events are added to the dictionary with the event names as the keys and the corresponding objects as the values. 此服務的實作器可以新增、 移除或變更在字典中的事件項目。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter event entries in the dictionary.

para.span: 傳回只有當有必要，因為重複的型別描述項的篩選器服務的查詢可能會降低效能。

span.span: Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.

Public Function FilterProperties (component As IComponent, properties As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterProperties : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

param.name: component
param.span: 要為其篩選屬性的元件。

span.span: The component to filter properties for.
A dictionary of properties that can be modified.

summary.span: 篩選元件透過 所公開的屬性。

span.span: Filters the properties that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果要對篩選的屬性集進行快取，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the set of filtered properties is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者要求一組元件的屬性，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of properties for a component. 屬性為索引鍵和對應就會加入到字典中的屬性名稱做為值的物件。The properties are added to the dictionary with the property names as the keys and the corresponding objects as the values. 此服務的實作器可以新增、 移除或變更屬性的字典中的項目。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter property entries in the dictionary.

para.span: 傳回只有當有必要，因為重複的型別描述項的篩選器服務的查詢可能會降低效能。

span.span: Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.
